sentences.sContent: Our experiments used acetaminophen for the obvious reason that it’s safer and simpler for people to take on a daily basis than an opiate.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our experiments used acetaminophen for the obvious reason that it’s safer and simpler for people to take on a daily basis than an opiate.
sentences.sCn: 我们的实验使用退热净来替代鸦片制剂的原因是它在每日服用的时候对人更加安全简单。

synos.tran: [毒物][药]鸦片制剂；麻醉剂；镇静剂

trans.tranOther: a drug that contains opium. Opiates can be used to reduce severe pain and help people to sleep.
